docs.abstract: A study out of Britain finds that children who are cared for by their grandparents while their parents work are far more likely to be overweight than children whose care is provided by daycare or an unrelated paid babysitter.
docs.lead_paragraph: Finally, something that isn't the mother's fault.
docs.snippet: A study out of Britain finds that children who are cared for by their grandparents while their parents work are far more likely to be overweight than children whose care is provided by daycare or an unrelated paid babysitter.

headline.main: Stand Up While You Read This!

docs.abstract: Too much sitting still, recent studies in rats and humans suggest, can offset the benefits of even regular exercise.
docs.snippet: Too much sitting still, recent studies in rats and humans suggest, can offset the benefits of even regular exercise.

headline.seo: When It Comes to Salt, No Rights or Wrongs. Yet.
headline.print_headline: When It Comes to Salt, No Rights or Wrongs. Yet.
headline.main: When It Comes to Salt, No Rights or Wrongs. Yet.

docs.lead_paragraph: There’s plenty of menacing talk about the perils of excess sodium. But where’s the evidence?

headline.seo: Study Finds Sharp Increase in Chronic Health Problems in Children
headline.print_headline: CHILDREN: Rate of Chronic Health Problems Rises
headline.main: Children: Rate of Chronic Health Problems Rises

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers said rates of problems like obesity and asthma doubled in the past 12 years, but many conditions resolved themselves during childhood.
docs.snippet: Researchers said rates of problems like obesity and asthma doubled in the past 12 years, but many conditions resolved themselves during childhood.

headline.main: Thirsty for Revenue, White House Reaches for Black Liquor

docs.abstract: The president's health care proposal depends in part on an usual revenue-raiser borrowed from the House bill.
docs.lead_paragraph: It sounds like a fight over a bottle of Johnnie Walker.
docs.snippet: The president's health care proposal depends in part on an usual revenue-raiser borrowed from the House bill.

docs.abstract: The Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association pushed back against prospects of federal regulation of premium increases.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association is hammering back at President Obama's proposal to give the federal government new power to review, and potentially block, health insurance premium increases.
docs.snippet: The Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association pushed back against prospects of federal regulation of premium increases.
